Class StaticByteBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.util.StaticByteBuffer

    StaticBuffer, Comparable<StaticBuffer>

    public class StaticByteBuffer
extends Object
implements StaticBuffer
    Implementation of StaticBuffer against a ByteBuffer
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • StaticByteBuffer

        public StaticByteBuffer(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Create a StaticByteBuffer backed by an existing ByteBuffer. The ByteBuffer is not copied. If buffer is externally modified, then those modifications will also appear in calls to the constructed StaticByteBuffer.
        Parameters:
        buffer -
